name: NorthStarWeather
0:
caret
”Alexa, open North Star”
”Show me the radar”
”What's the air quality?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: north star
Developer Terms of Use
des:
If you're an Amazon Prime member, you now get 5 guaranteed nice days of weather per year, brought to you by North Star weather. Powered by Dark Sky and Apple Weather, North Star provides hyper-local, hyper-accurate, and occasionally funny weather to start your day. Get live world-wide radar, air quality forecasts, up-to-the minute precipitation forecasts. And you can start your day with just the right amount of sarcasm. Give it a try. What else do you have to look forward to?

North Star uses the Dark Sky API to bring the highest quality, hyperlocal weather information.
Air Quality is provided by AirNow.

North Star weather is a subscription only product.
